data.title: Danish Surgical Society Annual Meeting (DKS) 16. – 17. november, 2023
data.meta_description: On behalf of Dansk Kirurgisk Selskab (DKS), we now offer the opportunity to exhibit at their annual meeting. The duration of the exhibition will be 2 days with changing audience.
data.text:
Exhibition area

The stands are allotted as bookings come in. Bigger stand have limited placement options.

Attention! The height of the room is 2,5 meters max.

Video of the venue

Overview of the exhibition area

DKS standtegning 2023

(The smallest booths are 1,5×2 = 3 but on this drawing only 2×2 are shown. Its just to show how much is possible.)

Programme

We move on with the attempt to make reasonably fluid breaks. This is to meet the desire for fewer people gathered at once and for you as exhibitors to be able to concentrate on those who come out and have more to do for a longer period of time. The differenc subjects are switched among the session rooms.

The registration and the coffee is served in the showroom, and all participants are reminded to come early and enjoy the exhibition and the food. BUT at 10.30 am the first real exhibitor break will be held. If you have finished setting up the stand before registration, it is p referable, it will also make more participants want to enter the room. Those of you who participate in the 2 minute presentations must be ready before, as it is completed before the first break.

Program DKS årsmøde 2023 januar

The meeting is COMPLIANT https://www.ethicalmedtech.eu/medtech-apps/cvs/view-event/EMT35844

Attendance

Approx. 350 (changing audience).

Budget

DKS 2023 budget English (Subject to change)

Remember to book hotel rooms directly at the venue

Booking of extra catering

Book your catering here

The fee for participating with an exhibition stand is as follows:

Price per m2: DKK 3,650

Administration fee: DKK 1,800 (does not go to the professional society)

Minimum stand size: 1,5*2 = 3

Price example:

3 m2 x 3,650 = 10,950 + 1,800 = DKK 12,750 for the smallest stand size.

Coffee will be served in the exhibition area.

As agreed with the venue, DKS is financially responsible for coffee/tea and lunch for:

1 person per stand of 3 – 4 m2

2 persons per stand of 4.5 – 6 m2

3 persons per stand of 6.5 – 9 m2

4 persons per stand if larger than 9.5 m2.

Please do not hesitate to contact us, if you need further information (e.g. special chair sizes or tables, etc.)

If you are interested in participating in the gala dinner, you must be a company member. Please contact us for further information

2 min. sessions

If you are interested in 2 min sessions pls contact Gitte and Jonas at : gitte.pia.froesig-petersen@regionh.dk witch CC to jonas.sanberg.ljungdalh@rsyd.dk

It is important to write them both, so remeber to send the Email to Gitte and CC Jonas too.

Gitte and Jonaswill need the following for the sessions:

– Topic

– Someone to give the speech

– 1-2 slides

Company session:

There are options on Thursday and Friday. Ex. a colorectal interested exhibitor can choose a slot where there are no colorectal lectures. The exhibitors must arrange speak and possibly AV help with resp. speakers and hotel.

The price of such a company session is DKK 25,000.

Send an email to info@conex.dk for more information.
